title: Spotted: Are Team DSM racing lightweight prototype Scope wheels at Tour de France?
content:
Are Team DSM racing lightweight new prototype Scope climbers’ wheels at this year’s Tour de France? We spotted unmarked, low-profile wheels while watching a wet Stage 9, as the riders got their biggest-yet mountain stage and the first beyond classification climb of the Grand Tour near the Swiss & Italian border. And after news just […]

The post Spotted: Are Team DSM racing lightweight prototype Scope wheels at Tour de France? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
